WELCOME TO TRUSLINK TRADING LLC

Embracing Trust for Seamless Distribution Experiences !

Truslink Trading LLC established in the year 2018 with Head Office at Dubai, UAE and engaged in wholesale and retail of Cosmetics, Household products, Cleaning products, Detergents and Food products. We cover almost all major cities in UAE through our Distribution Network.

 
Contact Us
Watch Video
A Subsidiary of TRUS HOLDING

"TRUSLINK - The Unmatched Leader in Prompt and Pristine FMCG Industry”

TRUSLINK places great emphasis on the speed and efficiency of its operational processes, namely the storage, transportation, and delivery of Fast Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) to their respective destinations. By prioritizing these factors, we ensure that our services are executed promptly and meticulously, while providing a high degree of accuracy and reliability to our clients.

Great paths to conquer

We listen, we plan, we dare the might, and make ideas beloved.

Truslink deals with all the major brands

Truslink deal with almost all major Brands in Cosmetics, Detergents and Cleaning, Food products etc. and has established contracts with all major suppliers for ensuring smooth supply of products. In addition to the local products Truslink also import the goods which are fast moving in UAE market. Further Truslink is in the process of taking agencies of leading brands in fast moving products for UAE market.

We Deals With

Truslink Traders LLC is on the forefront of developing brands in the FMCG sector across the region for over 2 decades, a rapidly growing enterprise in the GCC.

Chairman 's Message

"TRUSLINK - The Unmatched Leader in Prompt and Pristine FMCG Industry”

Our vision is To be a regional leader in Cosmetics, Detergents and cleaning, Food stuff products meeting the needs of community today and building capabilities to meet the needs of future generations and contributing towards building prosperous Economy , Nation Building and Providing Employment to UAE Nationals.
